name: Debashish Deb
title: Web Developer | Biotechnologist | Technology Enthusiast
about: I am a passionate web developer with a strong background in biotechnology. I love working on innovative projects that merge science and technology.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed scalable web applications using JavaScript and Go.
Implemented cloud-based solutions for biotech data analysis.

experience.title: Biotech Researcher
responsibilities: Worked on integrating machine learning in bioinformatics research.
Developed web-based visualization tools for genomic data.

achievements: Published research on biotech and AI integration.

testimonials.quote: Debashish is an outstanding developer with deep knowledge of biotech and web technologies.

testimonials.quote: A brilliant problem solver who always delivers high-quality work.
